title: Graph Growth Performance Audit
executive_summary: THE HARVEST IS EMPTY. The autonomous graph expansion has NOT occurred. Edge count remains at 3 since manual seeding. CEIO engine has been dormant for >4 hours. No DeepSeek-Speciale calls have been made. The system is ingesting data but NOT learning from it.

section_a_velocity.verdict: CRITICAL FAILURE - System is NOT learning

section_c_entropy.status: UNDEFINED - Graph too sparse for meaningful entropy calculation
section_c_entropy.note: With only 3 edges, H_sc = 0.0 (no uncertainty, but also no knowledge)

finding_2.evidence: No code path exists to call DeepSeek API for causal reasoning

finding_3.evidence: FINN research pipeline not connected to graph expansion
finding_3.impact: Market data flows in, but intelligence does not accumulate

last_ceio_activity.query: FINN CRIO: BULL regime, LIQUIDITY driven

the_brutal_truth: We have a pulse (ingestion is running), but no brain activity (no autonomous learning). The system is a body without a mind. Data flows through it, but wisdom does not accumulate. The First Harvest yielded NOTHING because we never planted the seeds of autonomous reasoning.

immediate_actions_required.action: Implement DeepSeek-Speciale integration for causal reasoning
Create autonomous CEIO research loop that runs continuously
Connect FINN research outputs to Alpha Graph edge generation
Implement feedback loop from shadow trades to knowledge fragments

signatures.attestation: This report is accurate. The system is not learning autonomously.
